content: add a small amount of stuffing to the socket before the pieces are fully joined scrap-buster holiday light garland december 2022 carla d t fisher 9 slip_stitch to join to start of joining round fo leaving a long tail 10 suggested for sewing using a yarn needle thread the yarn tail back into the socket and up through the center of the socket magic_ring round 1 your light is complete and ready to join to a garland cord using your chosen cord/socket color create a length of garland cord just about any cord will do cord-in-the-round crochet i-cord etc though a single chain stitch is likely too thin suggested cord method for good proportion with the finished lights https //www youtube com/watch v=ule6n-rivb4 assemble the garland sew or tie finished bulbs onto cord at regular intervals using the tail pulled through the magic_ring of each socket secure sewing tail to cord with a good knot weave in ends and trim remainder single finished lights also make cute and quick ornaments hang and enjoy happy holidays scrap-buster holiday light garland december 2022 carla d t fisher 10 helpful links magic_ring https //www planetjune com/blog/how-to-make-a-magic-ring-in-crochet-video/ invisible decrease https //www planetjune com/blog/invisible-decrease-for-amigurumi-video/ narrow pointed tubes for amigurumi for tip of bulbs https //www planetjune com/blog/narrow-pointed-tubes-for-amigurumi-video/ ❤ special thanks to my wonderful pattern testers ❤ sarah r scrap-buster holiday light garland december 2022 carla d t fisher 11
